Docs.typeparam: The user-defined type that provides the values while cursoring.
Docs.summary: This interface is an with 'strongly typed' binding. It can accept values of type and present the value as a row.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExtractValues(!TRow row) cil managed

Docs.param: The row object. Cannot be null.
Docs.summary: Accepts the fields of the user-supplied object and publishes the instance as a row. If the row is accessed prior to any object being set, then the data accessors on the row should throw.
